true.speed: The SpeedShake™ charges up the inner Woc inside you...
true.slow: The SlowShake™ charges up your inner woc, but it still isn't strong...
true.turbo: The TurboShake™ charges up your inner Woc to extreme levels...
true.reset: Your inner woc charges up back to normal levels...

false.speed: The SpeedShake™ calms down your inner woc down, but not fully...
false.slow: The SlowShake™ calms down your inner Woc beyond comprehension...
false.turbo: The TurboShake™ calms down your inner woc, but it is still highly active...
false.reset: Your inner woc calms down back to normal levels...
